Have you ever thought about dropping all the useless "Look we hacked this" junk and just upload .iso like the rest of us?  It would make everything you do run 100% smoother across multiple PC configurations... Just a tip...

its a false positive alert, iam not uploading virus/trojans at all, xpack=xpacker, in other words, the dll file is packed with a tool called xpacker (google) , and your viral tool doesnt knows the packing routine, and thinks its a virus.

disable antivirus (or put the extract folder to an exclusion list in your virus tool)
extract the game again, and play the fukka...
